urlCard.title: Video: Day of Rage: An In-Depth Look at How a Mob Stormed the Capitol
urlCard.description: A six-month Times investigation has synchronized and mapped out thousands of videos and police radio communications from the Jan. 6 Capitol riot, providing the most complete picture to date of what happened — and why.
